SEARCH
Package it.astromark.classmanagement.service

Interface ClassManagementService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClassManagementServiceImpl
public interface ClassManagementService
Service interface for managing school classes, students, and teaching activities. Provides methods for retrieving, adding, and managing class-related information.

  • Method Details

    • getYear

      Year getYear()
      Retrieves the current school year.
      Returns:
      the current `Year` object Pre-condition: None. Post-condition: Returns the current school year as a `Year` object.

    • getClasses

      List<SchoolClassResponse> getClasses()
      Retrieves a list of all school classes.
      Returns:
      a list of `SchoolClassResponse` objects representing the school classes Pre-condition: None. Post-condition: Returns a list of all existing school classes.

    • getStudents

      List<SchoolClassStudentResponse> getStudents(Integer classId)
      Retrieves a list of students in a specific class.
      Parameters:
      classId - the ID of the class
      Returns:
      a list of `SchoolClassStudentResponse` objects representing the students in the class Pre-condition: The `classId` must not be null. The class associated with the `classId` must exist. Post-condition: Returns a list of students enrolled in the specified class.

    • getTeachings

      List<TeachingResponse> getTeachings()
      Retrieves a list of all teachings.
      Returns:
      a list of `TeachingResponse` objects representing all teachings Pre-condition: None. Post-condition: Returns a list of all teachings managed by the system.

    • schoolClassResponse

      SchoolClassResponse schoolClassResponse(SchoolClassRequest request)
      Creates or retrieves a school class based on the provided request.
      Parameters:
      request - the `SchoolClassRequest` containing details of the class
      Returns:
      the created or retrieved `SchoolClassResponse` object Pre-condition: The `request` must not be null and must contain valid class details. Post-condition: Returns the created or existing school class details.

    • addTeaching

      void addTeaching(@NotNull @NotNull UUID teacheruuid, @NotNull @NotNull TeachingRequest teaching)
      Adds a new teaching activity for a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacheruuid - the UUID of the teacher
      teaching - the `TeachingRequest` containing details of the teaching activity Pre-condition: The `teacheruuid` and `teaching` must not be null. The teacher associated with the UUID must exist. Post-condition: A new teaching activity is added for the specified teacher.

    • getSubject

      List<String> getSubject()
      Retrieves a list of all subjects.
      Returns:
      a list of strings representing all subjects Pre-condition: None. Post-condition: Returns a list of all subjects managed by the system.

    • getTeacherClasses

      List<SchoolClassResponse> getTeacherClasses(@NotNull @NotNull UUID teacheruuid)
      Retrieves a list of classes assigned to a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacheruuid - the UUID of the teacher
      Returns:
      a list of `SchoolClassResponse` objects representing the teacher's classes Pre-condition: The `teacheruuid` must not be null. The teacher associated with the UUID must exist. Post-condition: Returns a list of classes assigned to the specified teacher.

    • addTeacherToClass

      void addTeacherToClass(@NotNull @NotNull UUID uuid, @NotNull @NotNull AddToClassRequest addToClassRequest)
      Adds a teacher to a specific class.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the teacher
      addToClassRequest - the `AddToClassRequest` containing details of the class and the teacher's role Pre-condition: The `uuid` and `addToClassRequest` must not be null. The teacher and class must exist. Post-condition: The teacher is added to the specified class with the specified role.

    • removeClass

      void removeClass(UUID uuuid, Integer schoolClassId)
      Removes a class associated with a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      uuuid - the UUID of the teacher whose class is to be removed
      schoolClassId - the ID of the class to be removed Pre-condition: The `teacheruuid` and `schoolClassId` must not be null. The teacher and class must exist. Post-condition: The specified class is removed from the teacher's assignments.

    • getClassTeachings

      List<TeachingResponse> getClassTeachings(@NotNull @NotNull Integer classId)
      Retrieves the list of teachings associated with a specific class.
      Parameters:
      classId - the ID of the class for which teachings are to be retrieved Pre-condition: The `classId` must not be null. The class must exist. Post-condition: Returns a list of `TeachingResponse` objects containing details about the teachings of the specified class.
      Returns:
      a list of `TeachingResponse` objects representing the teachings of the class

    • getParents

      List<SchoolClassParentResponse> getParents(@NotNull @NotNull Integer classId)
